name: KO Site settings plugin (GetSimple CMS)
descr: A GetSimple CMS plugin for site-wide custom settings, to be used independently or in conjunction with plugins like i18n.
It allows for the creation of setting lists, spread over multiple tabs, with choice for
each setting field between (currently) 8 input types and 3 access levels. The plugin features a very responsive UI (compared to its GS counterparts), and data is saved as JSON.
